select COMP_MEMBER_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into comp_member(CM_NO,CM_ID,CM_PWD,CM_REGNUM,CM_NAME,CM_REPRE,CM_MANAGER,CM_MGR_TEL,CM_ADDR,CM_DETAILADDR,CM_ZIPCODE,CM_EMAIL,CC_NO,CM_HOMEPAGE) values(#{cmNo},#{cmId},#{cmPwd},#{cmRegnum},#{cmName},#{cmRepre},#{cmManager},#{cmMgrTel},#{cmAddr},#{cmDetailAddr},#{cmZipcode},#{cmEmail},#{ccNo},#{cmHomepage})
mapper.select: select CM_PWD from comp_member where CM_ID=#{cmId}

select h.HN_NO, h.HN_NOTITITLE, h.HN_START, h.HN_DEADLINE, r.RESUME_NO, r.RESUME_NAME as name, r.RESUME_BIRTH as birth, extract(year from sysdate) - extract(year from r.RESUME_BIRTH) as age, r.RESUME_GENDER as gender, s.SH_SNAME as schoolName, s.SH_MAJOR as major, r.career_no from hire_noti h left outer join emp_sup e on h.hn_no=e.hn_no join resume r on e.resume_no = r.resume_no left outer join school_history s on r.RESUME_NO = s.RESUME_NO where h.HN_NO = 1 and r.EDU_NO = s.SH_EDU_NO
